                            [ G a m e   N o t e s ]

   Combining deep and engrossing game play with riveting first-person
   graphics, Arx Fatalis follows In the tradition of classics like Ultima
   Underworld, providing an Immersive environment where the dark, rich story
   unfolds. With a fully Interactive and detailed environment, every action
   will have repercussions. Exquisite attention Is paid to the smallest detail
   in order to provide an Intrigulng game play experience, where fighting and
   spell casting are implemented In a unique way.
